## IntersectionOfTypeTuple type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type IntersectionOfTypeTuple<Tuple> = Tuple extends [
    {
        readonly [designType]: infer A;
    },
]
    ? MergeIntersection<A>
    : Tuple extends [
          {
              readonly [designType]: infer A;
          },
          ...infer Rest
      ]
    ? MergeIntersection<A & IntersectionOfTypeTuple<Rest>>
    : Record<string, unknown>;
```
